entry.def: Lipstick is a coloured substance in the form of a stick which women put on their lips.

example.ex: ...glossy lipsticks made from natural oils and waxes.
example.tran: 由天然的油和蜡制成的亮彩唇膏

means.word_mean: 1. makeup that is used to color the lips

sentences.sentence: "The clown had lipsticked circles on his cheeks"
